DialogText:
You've more than helpedâ€”you've proven yourself capable of handling difficult situations with professionalism and care. Because of your exemplary performance, I'm happy to inform you that your application for the Personal Defense Permit (PDP) has been approved. Congratulations, you've earned it. You should recieve it by mail, so head to the closest post office.

Keep up the good work, @p. We need more people like you looking out for this community. And remember, the PDP is a responsibility as much as it is a right. Use it wisely.

pages: We are pleased to inform you that, following a thorough review of your application and assessment, your Personal Defense Permit (PDP) has been officially approved by the Gramados Permit Authority.
With this permit, you are now legally authorized to purchase, carry, and maintain small-caliber firearms, including pistols, for the purpose of personal defense.

It is important to remember that holding a PDP comes with the responsibility of adhering to the laws and regulations regarding firearm use. This permit allows you to protect yourself and your loved ones within the bounds of legal and ethical standards.

Your permit will be available for pickup at any Gramados Town Hall. We trust you will exercise the rights afforded to you responsibly and with care.

Thank you for your diligence and commitment to public safety.

DialogMail.Subject: Official Notification: Personal Defense Permit Approval
